statements: SELECT * FROM EsportsCommunicationLogs;
SELECT log_id, log_timestamp, log_message FROM EsportsCommunicationLogs WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT log_message FROM EsportsCommunicationLogs WHERE player_id = 5;
SELECT team_id, player_id FROM EsportsCommunicationLogs WHERE log_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM EsportsCommunicationLogs WHERE log_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT * FROM EsportsCommunicationLogs WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT log_message, log_timestamp FROM EsportsCommunicationLogs WHERE log_id = 10;
SELECT log_id, player_id FROM EsportsCommunicationLogs WHERE log_timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT * FROM EsportsCommunicationLogs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT team_id, count(player_id) AS players_count FROM EsportsCommunicationLogs GROUP BY team_id HAVING players_count > 1;
SELECT * FROM TeamCommunicationLogs;
SELECT team_id, log_text, log_timestamp FROM TeamCommunicationLogs WHERE player_id = 123;
SELECT player_id FROM TeamCommunicationLogs WHERE team_id = 456 ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT log_text FROM TeamCommunicationLogs WHERE team_id = 789 AND player_id = 321;
SELECT DISTINCT team_id FROM TeamCommunicationLogs;
SELECT * FROM TeamCommunicationLogs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT team_id, player_id, log_text FROM TeamCommunicationLogs WHERE team_id = 1 AND player_id = 5;
SELECT team_id, COUNT(player_id) AS players_count FROM TeamCommunicationLogs GROUP BY team_id ORDER BY players_count DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT team_id FROM TeamCommunicationLogs;
SELECT * FROM TeamCommunicationLogs WHERE log_id IN (1, 3, 5, 7, 9);
SELECT * FROM communication_logs;
SELECT message, timestamp, team_id FROM communication_logs WHERE team_id = 123;
SELECT player_id, message FROM chat_history WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT team_id, player_id, role FROM team_members WHERE team_id = 456 AND role = 'Admin';
SELECT log_id, message, timestamp FROM communication_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM communication_logs WHERE team_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT team_id, COUNT(*) AS total_logs FROM communication_logs GROUP BY team_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT team_id, channel_id, COUNT(*) AS total_messages FROM communication_logs GROUP BY team_id, channel_id ORDER BY total_messages DESC;
SELECT player_id, message FROM chat_history WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2022-02-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT team_id, player_id, role FROM team_members WHERE team_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND role = 'Admin';
SELECT * FROM team;
SELECT team_name, region FROM team WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT player_name, team_name FROM player JOIN team ON player.team_id = team.team_id;
SELECT log_message, log_timestamp FROM communication_log WHERE player_id = 2 ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT channel_id, channel_name FROM communication_channel ORDER BY channel_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM team WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT player_name, team_name FROM player JOIN team ON player.team_id = team.team_id;
SELECT channel_name, log_message FROM communication_channel INNER JOIN communication_log ON communication_channel.channel_id = communication_log.channel_id;
SELECT player_name, log_message, log_timestamp FROM player JOIN communication_log ON player.player_id = communication_log.player_id;
SELECT team_name, COUNT(player_id) AS total_players FROM team LEFT JOIN player ON team.team_id = player.team_id GROUP BY team_name;
SELECT team_name, team_region FROM team
SELECT player_name, player_age, player_role FROM player ORDER BY player_age DESC
SELECT * FROM chat_message WHERE sender_id = 1
SELECT room_name FROM chat_room WHERE room_id = 3
SELECT team_name, result FROM team JOIN tournament_result ON team.team_id = tournament_result.team_id WHERE result = 'win'
SELECT * FROM player WHERE player_age > 25
SELECT player_name, player_role FROM player ORDER BY player_role DESC
SELECT team_name, team_region FROM team WHERE team_region = 'Europe' AND team_name LIKE 'T%'
SELECT message_text, message_time FROM chat_message WHERE sender_id = 1 ORDER BY message_time DESC
SELECT team_id, result FROM tournament_result WHERE result = 'win' OR result = 'tie'
